PROJECT(7z)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

IF(COMMAND cmake_policy)
	CMAKE_POLICY(SET CMP0003 NEW)
ENDIF(COMMAND cmake_policy)

SET(SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION 9)
SET(SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION 20)
SET(SEVENZIP_VERSION ${SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION}.${SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION})

FIND_PACKAGE(PythonInterp)

SET(SEVENZIP_PROJECT_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${SEVENZIP_PROJECT_DIR}/../..")

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Compiler.cmake)

SET_PROPERTY(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

SET(SEVENZIP_OUTPUT_DIR "${SEVENZIP_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(KLAYGE_BIN_DIR "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/KlayGE/bin/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/7z${SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION}${SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION}.tar.bz2")
SET(DST_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/7z/DOC/readme.txt")
SET(SEVENZIP_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z")
SET(PATCH_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/patch.py")

SET(REGEN FALSE)
IF(EXISTS ${DST_PATH})
	SET(SEVENZIP_VERSION_STR 0)
	FILE(STRINGS ${DST_PATH} SEVENZIP_VERSION_STR REGEX "7-Zip ")
	STRING(FIND "${SEVENZIP_VERSION_STR}" "${SEVENZIP_VERSION}" POS)
	IF(NOT POS EQUAL 6)
		SET(REGEN TRUE)
	ENDIF()
ELSE()
	SET(REGEN TRUE)
ENDIF()

IF(REGEN)
	IF(KLAYGE_PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
		DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z.exe" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
		DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z.dll" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
	ELSE()
		DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
		DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z.so" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
		FILE(COPY ${SEVENZIP_PATH} DESTINATION "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads")
		FILE(COPY "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/7z" DESTINATION "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}/" FILE_PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE)
	ENDIF()
	DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/Downloads/patch.py" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")
	DOWNLOAD_FILE_URL(${REL_PATH} "http://www.7-zip.org/a/7z${SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION}${SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION}.tar.bz2")
	DOWNLOAD_FILE("External/7z/Patches/ForOSXIOSAndroidAndWinRT.patch" "cbda47a1678ce70b6720856736100979d469e159")

	EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND "${SEVENZIP_PATH}" "x" "-y" "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/${REL_PATH}" WORKING_DIRECTORY "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/7z")
	EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND "${SEVENZIP_PATH}" "x" "-y" "7z${SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION}${SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION}.tar" WORKING_DIRECTORY "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/7z")
	FILE(REMOVE "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/7z/7z${SEVENZIP_MAJOR_VERSION}${SEVENZIP_MINOR_VERSION}.tar")
	EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND "${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE}" "${PATCH_PATH}" "-p0" "Patches/ForOSXIOSAndroidAndWinRT.patch" WORKING_DIRECTORY "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/7z")
ENDIF()

IF(MSVC)
	SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} /W3 /WX-")
	SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} /W3 /WX-")
ENDIF()

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(7zxa)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(LZMA)
